entry.title: Friday: Chance of light snow. High minus 20. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of light snow. Fog at times this morning and early this afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 20. Wind chill minus 26 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EDT Friday 17 March 2023
